page.title: 16Population Spread
page.content: The population of the area is quite sparce with the majority of people living, naturally, in the village of Bridgerule. The approximate number of residents in the village is 350 of whom about 60 are under eighteen years of age. There are many farms in the area although several of the farmhouses have been split to accommodate more than one family. In the area of Borough there are seventeen residents, at Borough Cross nine but at Shernick the farm is half a mile from any neighbours. This dispersal of population is typical of a mainly farming community and the village acts as a focal meeting place as does the nearby market town of Holsworthy where local residents and farmers meet on market day each Wednesday.
